/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. Cars of various colors are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban landscapes. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
